title: NK SYSTECH responsive business website (Home, About, Services, Contact) with inquiry form

requirements.summary: Build a responsive single-page, multi-section NK SYSTECH website with clear navigation to Home, About, Services, and Contact.
acceptanceCriteria: A top navigation (desktop) and mobile menu allow users to reach Home, About, Services, and Contact sections/pages
All pages/sections display the business name “NK SYSTECH” prominently
Site is responsive and readable on mobile, tablet, and desktop sizes

file_operations.description: Create the main single-page layout with anchored sections (Home, About, Services, Contact) and ensure “NK SYSTECH” is prominent in the header/hero. Use shadcn-ui components (e.g., Sheet/Drawer for mobile navigation, Button for CTAs) to compose a responsive header/navigation. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Add a responsive header with desktop nav links and a mobile menu toggle that scrolls to the Home/About/Services/Contact sections. Use shadcn-ui navigation primitives (e.g., Button + Sheet) for consistent interaction patterns. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Create a small reusable section wrapper component to standardize spacing, max-width, and headings across the page for consistent responsiveness.
Implement a helper link component that scrolls smoothly to an on-page section id and supports keyboard navigation (Enter/Space) for accessibility.
Ensure the app renders the new App.tsx and that global providers remain intact; no authentication UI is introduced (Internet Identity provider can stay unused).

requirements.summary: Add a Services area listing CCTV, Workstations, Networking, Laptops, and Computers with short English descriptions emphasizing Sales & Service.
acceptanceCriteria: Services section/page includes at least five service cards/blocks: CCTV, Workstations, Networking, Laptops, Computers
Each service includes a short description in English and a clear “Sales & Service” emphasis
Services are presented in a consistent layout (grid/list) that adapts responsively

file_operations.description: Create the Services section with a responsive grid of five consistent cards (CCTV, Workstations, Networking, Laptops, Computers) including concise English descriptions with explicit “Sales & Service” emphasis. Use shadcn-ui components (e.g., Card, Badge) for consistent styling. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Wire the ServicesSection into the page and ensure it is reachable via header navigation and on-page anchors.

requirements.summary: Add a simple Products / Multibrand Sales & Service category listing component and make it reachable from Services or Home.
acceptanceCriteria: A listing UI exists that presents categories (e.g., Cameras/DVR/NVR, Routers/Switches, Laptops, Desktops, Workstations) without requiring pricing or inventory
Each category item includes a short label and a brief supporting line of text
The listing is accessible from the Services section/page or Home page

file_operations.description: Create a category listing component (no pricing/inventory) presenting relevant multibrand categories (e.g., Cameras/DVR/NVR, Routers/Switches, Laptops, Desktops, Workstations) with a label and a short supporting line per item. Use shadcn-ui components (e.g., Card, Separator) for a consistent, responsive layout. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Include the ProductCategories listing within or directly below the Services area so it is accessible from the Services section without adding a new top-level route.

requirements.summary: Implement a Contact section with an inquiry form (validation + loading/success/error states) that submits to the backend and optionally allows basic inquiry listing for verification/testing.
acceptanceCriteria: Contact form includes fields: Name, Phone, Email, Service Interest, Message, plus a Submit button
Client-side validation prevents empty required fields and clearly indicates validation errors
On submit, the UI shows a loading state and then a success message when stored, or an error message if it fails
Backend stores inquiries in stable state and exposes a method to create an inquiry and a method to list inquiries (for basic verification/testing)

file_operations.description: Create the Contact section containing the inquiry form fields (Name, Phone, Email, Service Interest dropdown, Message) with client-side validation and clear inline error messaging. Use shadcn-ui form inputs (e.g., Input, Textarea, Select, Button, Alert) for consistent UI. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Implement a hook to manage inquiry submission state (idle/loading/success/error), perform basic client-side validation, and call the backend submit function. Keep user-facing copy in English.

Define the service-interest dropdown options for NK SYSTECH (CCTV, Workstations, Networking, Laptops, Computers, Other) and map them safely to the existing backend ServiceInterest enum values from frontend/src/backend.d.ts (labels shown to users remain NK SYSTECH-focused, while values are translated for backend compatibility).
Add a small verification/testing helper hook that can fetch the inquiry list from the backend (e.g., via getAllInquiries) and expose loading/error state for a read-only list UI (no admin CRUD).

Add an optional, clearly labeled read-only inquiry listing block (for basic verification/testing) near the Contact section, rendered behind a collapsible disclosure. Use shadcn-ui components (e.g., Accordion/Collapsible, Table) for a clean presentation. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Wire the ContactSection into the page and ensure it is reachable via header navigation and on-page anchors; include the optional inquiry listing block for basic verification/testing.

requirements.summary: Apply a cohesive, non-default tech-services visual theme with consistent palette/typography/spacing (avoid blue/purple dominance).
acceptanceCriteria: A consistent theme is applied across navigation, headings, buttons, cards, and footer
Color palette avoids blue/purple as dominant colors and remains readable with sufficient contrast
Layout feels intentional (hero/sections spacing, consistent card styling, consistent button styles)

file_operations.description: Add global styling entry point for Tailwind plus a cohesive theme using CSS variables (tech/industrial feel). Ensure dominant colors are not blue/purple (e.g., charcoal/graphite with amber/green accents) and maintain readable contrast.
Adjust theme extensions (if needed) to support the chosen palette/typography/spacing consistently across header, buttons, cards, and footer; keep styling centralized and intentional.

Create a Home hero section with consistent typography, spacing, and primary/secondary CTAs to establish a polished theme. Use shadcn-ui components (e.g., Button) for consistent CTAs. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Wire in HeroSection and ensure overall section spacing and component styling feels intentional and consistent across the page.

requirements.summary: Add a footer with NK SYSTECH placeholders for address/phone/email and quick links to main sections.
acceptanceCriteria: Footer renders on all pages/sections
Footer contains NK SYSTECH name and placeholder contact details in English
Footer includes working quick links to the site’s main sections/pages

file_operations.description: Create a footer that displays NK SYSTECH name, placeholder address/phone/email, and quick links to Home/About/Services/Contact (scroll-to-section behavior). Use shadcn-ui typography/link styling patterns where appropriate. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Render Footer at the bottom of the page so it appears across all sections and ensure quick links scroll to the correct anchors.

requirements.summary: Add generated static images under frontend/public/assets/generated and use them as logo, hero/banner, and service icons in the UI.
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images are placed under frontend/public/assets/generated and referenced directly by the frontend (not served from backend)
Logo image is used in the header and footer
Hero/banner image appears on the Home page/section
Service icons/illustrations appear in the Services section/page

file_operations.description: Add the generated NK SYSTECH logo asset at the exact required path for direct frontend referencing.
Add the generated wide hero/banner image asset at the exact required path for direct frontend referencing.
Add the generated combined service icons image asset at the exact required path for direct frontend referencing.
Reference and render the logo image from frontend/public/assets/generated/nk-systech-logo.dim_512x512.png in the header brand area (responsive sizing and accessible alt text).
Reference and render the logo image from frontend/public/assets/generated/nk-systech-logo.dim_512x512.png in the footer brand area (accessible alt text).
Use the hero banner image from frontend/public/assets/generated/nk-systech-hero.dim_1600x600.png in the Home hero (as a banner/illustration) with accessible alt text and responsive behavior.

Display service icons/illustrations sourced from frontend/public/assets/generated/nk-systech-service-icons.dim_1024x256.png alongside each service card (ensure consistent sizing and accessible alt text).
